name: UNESCO Recommendation on the Ethics of Artificial Intelligence
provider: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
use_case: Global ethical guidance for the development and use of AI systems with respect for human rights and sustainable development.
data_summary: Emphasizes data governance principles including transparency, fairness, and respect for cultural diversity.
monitoring: Encourages member states to establish oversight mechanisms and periodic reporting on ethical AI implementation.
emergency_plan: Promotes remediation strategies to address harmful or discriminatory AI outcomes.
obligations: Adopt ethical impact assessment frameworks for AI projects.
Ensure transparency and explainability commensurate with risk.
Safeguard human rights, environmental sustainability, and diversity.
